languages.text: "Я убежусь в том, что ваше желание будет доведено до всех ответственных". {n}Если Клеменциа и испугана, она ничем не выдает свои эмоции.{/n}
"I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я убежусь в том, что ваше желание будет доведено до всех ответственных". {n}Если Клеменциа и испугана, она ничем не выдает свои эмоции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}Whether or not Clementia is frightened, nothing betrays her emotions.{/n}
"I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}Whether or not Clementia is frightened, nothing betrays her emotions.{/n}
"I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}
"I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}
"I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

languages.text: 「あなたの希望をすべての責任者に伝えるようにいたします」{n}クレメンティアが恐怖におののいていたとしても、表情からは一切うかがい知れない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの希望をすべての責任者に伝えるようにいたします」{n}クレメンティアが恐怖におののいていたとしても、表情からは一切うかがい知れない。{/n}

languages.text: “我会将您的意愿转达给所有相关人员。”{n}即便是你的威胁让克莱门缇雅惶恐不安，她也没有流露出一点惧色。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我会将您的意愿转达给所有相关人员。”{n}即便是你的威胁让克莱门缇雅惶恐不安，她也没有流露出一点惧色。{/n}

languages.text: «Me ocuparé de que todos los responsables queden informados de sus deseos». {n}Si Clementia tiene miedo, lo oculta perfectamente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me ocuparé de que todos los responsables queden informados de sus deseos». {n}Si Clementia tiene miedo, lo oculta perfectamente.{/n}

languages.text: « Je veillerai à ce que toutes les personnes concernées soient informées de votre souhait. » {n}Si Clémentia est effrayée, elle n'en laisse rien paraître.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je veillerai à ce que toutes les personnes concernées soient informées de votre souhait. » {n}Si Clémentia est effrayée, elle n'en laisse rien paraître.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass alle Verantwortlichen über Eure Wünsche informiert werden." {n}Sollte Clementia Angst haben, verbirgt sie es erfolgreich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde dafür sorgen, dass alle Verantwortlichen über Eure Wünsche informiert werden." {n}Sollte Clementia Angst haben, verbirgt sie es erfolgreich.{/n}

languages.text: "Taleplerinizi bu işin sorumlularına bildireceğimden emin olabilirsiniz." {n}Clementia korktuysa da hiç belli etmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I will see to it that everyone responsible is informed of your wishes." {n}If Clementia is frightened, she does nothing to reveal it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Taleplerinizi bu işin sorumlularına bildireceğimden emin olabilirsiniz." {n}Clementia korktuysa da hiç belli etmiyor.{/n}
